data.title: The Michael Collins Brilliant Uncirculated 24-carat Gold Medal
data.meta_description: The legacy of a revolutionary hero - Michael Collins, immortalised in pure gold and strictly limited to just one medal per household
data.meta_site_name: The Michael Collins Brilliant Uncirculated 24-carat Gold Medal - Irish History
data.text:
Order your very own Michael Collins Brilliant Uncirculated Pure 24-Carat Gold Medal Today for just €69! (Plus €4.95 P&P)

Michael Collins, born 16 October 1890, is one of if not the most significant figure in Irish history. Born at Woodfield, near Clonakilty, in West Cork, he was the youngest child in a family of eight and was raised on his parents’ farm. His father died when he was just six years old and according to a relative, the elder Collins on his death bed declared that his son Michael would be “a great man yet and will do great things for Ireland.”

Collins’ passion for his nation, and the ultimate sacrifice he paid in securing freedom for Ireland, is what makes him one of the most beloved figures in our history still to this day! For this, I am proud to offer you a brand-new pure 24-carat gold medal, in honour of the legendary man whose efforts made our eventual freedom possible struck in Brilliant Uncirculated quality.

We believe that gold should be accessible to everyone, not just in the pockets of the rich and famous, but affordable for the everyman too. For many, it has felt like an unachievable goal – until now! What better time to secure your own gold, whilst paying tribute to a beloved national hero!

The Michael Collins Brilliant Uncirculated Pure 24-carat Gold Coin is available to you for just€69 (Plus €4.95 P&P) and is limited to just 19,999 available worldwide! Due to a strict limitation, only 1 medal per household is allowed.

Rest assured, you have no further commitments, and your purchase is protected by The Dublin Mint Office's 14-day “no quibble” guarantee.
